items.title: Governor Swaps Three Trustees Amid Rock-Bottom Free Speech Rankings For Indiana University
items.description: 'What is the scandal about a conservative Republican governor appointing conservatives to a position?' James Bopp said.

items.title: After Pointlessly Villainizing Conservatives, Prime Video’s Ballet Dramedy ‘Étoile’ Is Canceled
items.description: Writer Amy Sherman-Palladino thinks ballet can only be saved through gimmicks. She’s wrong.

items.title: Is Your Child’s Public School Teaching Eastern Mysticism Like This Chicago Classroom?
items.description: This is not simply a question of educational best practices; it’s a battle over worldview.

items.title: America Will Be Better Off, And More Self-Reliant, Without Illegal Immigrant Labor
items.description: Not relying on illegal immigrant labor means we have to learn to take care of ourselves, much as Americans have for most of our history.
